data.title: Donate – St Jude Neighborhood Health
data.text:
We are honored to receive your contribution today. No benefit was bestowed upon this donor in exchange for this contribution other than the joy of giving to St. Jude Neighborhood Health Centers, which supports services and programs for the community. We are an exempt organization as described in Section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code; EIN tax identification number is 45-3977605.

All donations received are property of St. Jude Neighborhood Health Centers and will be used towards our health care efforts as described on our website under the direction of our all-volunteer Board of Directors. Monies received will be credited to St. Jude Neighborhood Health Centers donation account, and then distributed from the donation account to the selected need(s).

Information contained herein was accurate at the time of posting. The information on this website is not intended as legal or tax advice. For such advice, please consult an attorney or tax advisor. Figures cited in any examples are for illustrative purposes only. References to tax rates include federal taxes only and are subject to change. State law may further impact your individual results.

Donation examples for goods or services made available through your donation are examples for goods or services made available through (each such giving, a “need”) and will assist our health center(s) under St. Jude Neighborhood Health Centers to operate for all who walk through our doors.

All descriptions, images, references, features, content, specifications, products, and prices of products and services described or depicted on our website are subject to change at any time without notice and are in current use as an example of the goods and services we provide to our patients.

We are grateful for your gift and support to St. Jude Neighborhood Health Centers. We will carefully consider the needs of the organization and will use your donation where it is most essential; or designated to herein by your selection; and all donations may directly and indirectly support St. Jude Neighborhood Health Centers. When processing each gift, we will follow documented St. Jude Neighborhood Health Centers business rules and agreements and generally accepted accounting principles standards. Due to the nature of charity donations, we are under no obligation to give refunds. All donations are final and are non-refundable.

This policy establishes notice and consent requirements expected of individuals, third parties, and service providers as it pertains to their specific relationship to the personal data in question. An individual who donates to St. Jude Neighborhood Health Centers enters willingly into this agreement. Information you send or get through the site is private. St. Jude Neighborhood Health Centers does not share your information, and we do not sell or license your information. Collection or processing of personal data of an individual will only be made when the individual has consented for a specific purpose or in accordance with a permissible purpose as described in this policy.

When you donate through our portal, you will need to enter your name, email address, phone number and address listed. You will be required to manually enter your credit card details. This information allows us to process and fulfill your donation successfully. When entering you donation details, we use a secure server. The secure server software (SSL) encrypts all information you input before it is sent to us. Furthermore, all the sensitive and personal data that is entered is protected by several layers of encryption and several layers of security to prevent unauthorized access.

Payment by credit or debit card is the only way to donate. All credit or debit card donations are processed securely to Farmers and Merchants Bank donations account. St. Jude Neighborhood Health Centers does not store any credit card information on our servers. All uses and processes of your donation information is in accordance with our privacy standards. Credit Card donations are made directly through a 256-bit SSL Encryption software to ensure your personal details are kept safe.

By using our website and donation portal, you consent to the use of the information entered to process said donation. None of your credit card details are stored. This ensures you will be satisfied in the security of your donation.

Need-specific costs or donations in general, are not a promotion. In other words, when you donate for an example of a specific need for our health centers, you will not redeem that promotion. You will not be subject to fees which do not apply to someone not redeeming a promotion.

Your donations are deemed valid without unspecified additional user requirements. Need specific donations will not impose requirements to sign up for a paid membership, taking part in a survey to make a donation, and/or you will not receive a discount on goods or services for those solely outlined as examples of our health center needs. There is no promotion period or while supplies last, all donations are welcome through our portal.
